Class ScreenRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redstoneblocks.java.swing_mvc.runner.ScreenRegistry

  • public class ScreenRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    A registry of every screen for the application.

    • Method Detail

      • addScreen

        public <M extends java.lang.Class<? extends Model>,V extends java.lang.Class<? extends View>,C extends java.lang.Class<? extends Controller>> void addScreen(ScreenCreator<M,V,C> screen)
        A method to register a com.redstoneblocks.java.swing_mvc.runner.Screen.
        Type Parameters:
        M - the class of the model, extends com.redstoneblocks.java.swing_mvc.core.Model
        V - the class of the view, extends com.redstoneblocks.java.swing_mvc.core.View
        C - the class of the controller, extends com.redstoneblocks.java.swing_mvc.core.Controller
        Parameters:
        screen - the screen to register

      • getInstance

        public static ScreenRegistry getInstance()
        create a new ScreenRegistry if it doesn't exist, or return the current one.
        Returns:
        the current ScreenRegistry

      • containsScreen

        public boolean containsScreen(java.lang.String name)
        A method to see if the ScreenRegistry contains the specified screen. This method is used by navigator to check for screen existence.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the screen creator
        Returns:
        if the ScreenRegistry has a screen creator with that name
        See Also:
        Navigator

      • createFromName

        public Screen createFromName(java.lang.String name)
        Call Create() on the screen creator with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the screen creator
        Returns:
        the result of Create()

      • createEntryPoint

        public Screen createEntryPoint()
                        throws NoScreensException
        Call Create() on the first found screen creator. Not guaranteed to be the same screen creator when run multiple times. This will be fixed in the future.
        Returns:
        the result of Create()
        Throws:
        NoScreensException - when there are no screens in the registry

      • addScreensFromClassPath

        public void addScreensFromClassPath()
        Adds all the screens with the @MVC annotation in the classpath to the registry
